name: Sips
description:
A chill idle GBA game made for GBA WinterJam 2023.

Gameplay

Enjoy people watching while you earn money to upgrade your cafe.

Controls

A - Open Upgrade Menu

Up/Down - To Change Upgrade Selection

B - Close Upgrade Menu

Versions

sips.gba - The game and entry for GBA WinterJam 2023

sips-live.gba - A non-interactive version that does away with the UI and is just nice to look at. Buy this as a way to support me making more games.

Credits

Find music and sound credits here.

Source Code

Source for the game can be found here.
